name: The Perfect Day
description:
Finally, you made your dream come true, you've been hired in your dream company! Well, you're just an Intern right now, but you'll have to show the best you can do to succeed!

For that, you'll have to accomplish all sorts of demands for the other employee... For sure, it will be enriching and help you be ready for the real work world...

To be the perfect intern, you'll have to make every day perfect... But you'll have a limited time each day to do so. Keep trying!

You can carry a limited number of item and write a limited number of lines on your Notepad, but you'll be able to increase those number with all the experience you earn.

CONTROLS :

- Arrow keys / ZQSD / WASD to move the intern

- Left click to take/give coffee, files, make photocopy...

- Space to open/close Notepad.

REQUESTS :

- Take a coffee at the coffeemaker and bring it to the employee. You can also throw a coffee in the bin net to the coffeemaker 
- Take files from the employee and bring it to the cupboard
- Take files from the employee, photocopy it, and bring the photocopy back to the employee
- Bring files that you have to an employee that demand it
